titleStmt.title: W. T. Poynter to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1529

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
Quarter Master Generals Office
Frankfort Oct 7 1863
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Govr of Ky
Sir
I have the honor to report that during the month of September I audited and passed for payment out of the Recruiting Fund, claims which for convenience are classified as follows viz
This report embraces only those claims presented between the 1st and 30th days inclusive of September. and amount in the aggregate to Eight-thousand and fifty four dollars and thirty six cents --

Resply &
W. T. Poynter
Auditing clerk of Q. M. G. Office
Report of W. T. Poynter of claims passed by him for paymnt during the month of September 1863
